name: Mittelborg: City of Mages
description: The turn-based saga Mittelborg: City of Mages is a wild mix of strategy, roguelike and survival. The magical world awaits its Chancellor: take control over the city, survive in mystical storm attacks, fight the chaos and restore the balance in the Universe.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 (32-bit), Windows VistaÂ® (32-bit), Windows 7, Windows 8.1 and Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, OpenGL 2.0 Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
